name: Edge Knight!
description:
Introduction

Edge Knight! is a 2D action shooter with unique Edge mechanic, you play as a knight, going to dungeon and fight against monsters that shoot you with bullet, use the Edge Power to defense yourself and beat evil creature!

Control

WASD - Move

Mouse Drag: Create Edge

Mouse Drag on Edge: Shoot Edge

R - Reset game

This game is submitted to VimJam 2: Boss [8 Bits to Infinity]

We use prebuilt asset：

  • 16x16 DungeonTileset II by 0x72 (itch.io)
  • Pixel Art Top Down - Basic by Cainos (itch.io)
  • Pixel Health Bar Asset Pack 2 by adwitr (itch.io)
  • Pixel Explosion by NYKNCK (itch.io)
  • Pixel Health Bar Asset Pack by adwitr (itch.io)
  • https://maou.audio/bgm_cyber44/
  • PixelMplus - 無料で使える日本語フォント投稿サイト｜フォントフリー (fontfree.me)
